Trade/Device Name(s): MINICAP Immunotyping Using the MINICAP and the MINICAP FLEX-PIERCING
MINICAP IMMUNOTYPING using the MINICAP FLEX-PIERCING
Regulation Name(s): Immunoglobulins A, G, M, D, and E immunological test system
Immunoglobulin (light chain specific) immunoglobulin test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MINICAP Immunotyping using MINICAP and MINICAP FLEX-PIERCING instruments for detection and characterization of monoclonal proteins in human serum by capillary electrophoresis.
Indications for Use Summary: Designed for detection and characterization of monoclonal proteins (immunotyping) in human serum with the MINICAP and MINICAP FLEX-PIERCING instruments, using capillary electrophoresis for qualitative analysis.
